item.title: ‘I hate to be the interfering mother-in-law’: My son bought a house with his wife — so why is his father-in-law on the deed?
item.description: “I asked him if he was also on the deed. He said yes.”

item.title: I have two life-insurance policies, but ‘rude’ agents keep calling me to change the terms. How do I stop this harassment?
item.description: “The agent said that my policy is in jeopardy of lapsing.”

item.title: My husband filed for divorce, but did not contribute one penny towards the mortgage. Is he entitled to half of our home?
item.description: “He forced me to pay every payment.”

item.title: The WSJ Dollar Index Rises 0.1% to 101.21
item.description: The WSJ Dollar Index was up 0.1% to 101.21 — higher for six consecutive trading days.

item.title: Nvidia’s stock misses out on the big chip rally after Broadcom earnings
item.description: One analyst noted that the type of AI chip Broadcom makes could pick up market share relative to “costly” graphics processing units.
